column4: i want to delete a bridge with "sudo brctl delbr br0" but it says "bridge br0 is is still up; can't delete it", although br0 is down, and no interfaces belongs to the bridge
hi, i want to delete a bridge with "sudo brctl delbr br0" but it says "bridge br0 is is still up; can't delete it", although br0 is down, and no interface belongs to the bridge
thx a lot, it works, i though it was the same as ifdown br0
